anya-e0803n12:133_3: Ettha ‘‘ko, ke. Kā, kā, kāyo. Kiṁ,

anya-e0803n12:133_5: Nāmasaddena pana samāse tesaṁ dvidhā gati dissati ‘‘kinnāmo,
anya-e0803n12:133_7: Sabbāni panetāni itthinapuṁsakaliṅgavasena bahuvacanavasena ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:138_2: Tattha hi kiṁcittaṁ yassa so kiṁcitto.
anya-e0803n12:138_3: ‘‘Kiṁ karomi sāmī’’ti evaṁ kinti kāro karaṇaṁ saddanicchāraṇaṁ kiṁkāro,

anya-e0803n12:139_0: ‘‘Visuṁ padāvayavo vā, hutvā nvādīhi vā pana;
anya-e0803n12:143_0: Idāni sabbanāmikabhāve ṭhitehi ko kaṁsaddehi samānasutikānaṁ aññesaṁ ko kaṁsaddānaṁ nāmikapadamālāviseso vattabbo siyā,
anya-e0803n12:143_6: Akiṁsaddamayattā sabbanāmikarūpasaṅkhātehi asādhāraṇarūpehi virahitattā pucchatthato atthantaravācakattā ca.
anya-e0803n12:143_7: Ettha pana samānasutivasena atthantaraviññāpanatthaṁ kosaddo kaṁsaddoti ca vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:144_0: Kāye brahmani vāte ca, sīse jalasukhesu ca;
anya-e0803n12:145_0: Kasaddo vattatī tīsu, pumā tīsu napuṁsako.
anya-e0803n12:149_0: Kiṁ kiṁpakkena sadisaṁ, kāyo kiṁpabhavo vada;
anya-e0803n12:157_0: Yā pana tā heṭṭhā amhehi liṅgattayavasena kiṁsaddassa sabbanāmikasaññitassa nāmikapadamālā vibhattā,

anya-e0803n12:157_3: kassa’’nti imāni ca padāni pahāya tato tato sesapadato yathāsambhavaṁ cisaddaṁ canasaddaṁ canaṁsaddañca nipātetvā evarūpāni rūpāni gahetabbāni.

anya-e0803n12:159_1: kāci itthiyo. Kāci, kāci. Kiñci, kāci. Kāyaci, kāhici. Kāyaci, kassāci, kāsañci. Kāyaci, kāhici. Kāyaci, kassāci, kāsañci. Kāyaci,
anya-e0803n12:160_1: na naṁ hiṁsāmi kiñcana’’ntiādayo payogā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n12:160_2: Iti liṅgattayavasena vuttāni koci kāci kiñcītiādīni appamattakānaṁ saṅgāhakavacanānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:163_0: Ettha ‘‘yo koci maṁ aṭṭhi katvā suṇeyya.
anya-e0803n12:163_2: saccaṁ tesaṁ sādhutaraṁ rasāna’’ntiādayo payogā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n12:164_7: Yaṁ kiñci vittaṁ idha vā huraṁ vā.
anya-e0803n12:166_0: Ettha ‘‘yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā’’tiādayo payogā veditabbā.
anya-e0803n12:166_2: Iti liṅgattayavasena vuttāni yo koci, yā kāci,
anya-e0803n12:166_7: tīsu liṅgesu sattasu vibhattīsu ekākārena tiṭṭheyyuṁ,
anya-e0803n12:167_0: Apica ya ta kiṁ etaiccetehi sabbanāmehi liṅgānurūpato ttakattikapaccaye katvā vatticchāyaṁ yāni padāni sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n12:167_2: Tesaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisa citta kaññānayena yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:168_2: yattikā itthī. Tattako, tattakaṁ, tattikā. Kittako, kittakaṁ, kittikā. Ettako, ettakaṁ, ettikāti.
anya-e0803n12:168_3: Imāni padāni asabbanāmikānipi paccayavasena sambhūtatthantaresu viññūnaṁ kosallatthaṁ vuttāni.
anya-e0803n12:170_0: Ekasaddo hi saṅkhāvacano ca hoti asadisavacano ca asahāyavacano ca ekaccavacano ca missībhūtavacano ca.
anya-e0803n12:171_0: Eko, ekaṁ, ekena, ekassa, ekasmā, ekamhā, ekassa, ekasmiṁ, ekamhīti.
anya-e0803n12:171_2: Tathā hi ‘‘eko dve tayo’’ti saṅkhāvisaye ekasaddo ekavacanakova.
anya-e0803n12:172_0: Yadā pana saṅkhatthā ca asahāyā ca bahū vattabbā siyuṁ,
anya-e0803n12:172_1: tadā ekasaddato kakārāgamaṁ katvā ekakā, ekake, ekakehi, ekakebhi.
anya-e0803n12:172_7: ayampi ekova āgato’’ti vattabbe ‘‘ime gahapatayo ekakā āgatā’’ti vattabbatā dissati.
anya-e0803n12:172_8: Ayaṁ nayo sabbanāmikapakkhaṁ na bhajati asādhāraṇarūpābhāvato,
anya-e0803n12:173_11: ubho ekā bhavantu te’’ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n12:173_12: Ayaṁ nayo sabbanāmikapakkhaṁ na bhajati asādhāraṇarūpābhāvato,
anya-e0803n12:173_15: gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṁ viya aññadatthu saṁsandantu samentūti vacanattho.
anya-e0803n12:174_0: Ācariyā pana evaṁ vibhāgaṁ adassetvā ekasaddassa sabbanāmattameva gahetvā sabbasaddassa viya nāmikapadamālaṁ yojenti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n12:175_0: Eko, eke. Ekaṁ, eke. Ekena, ekehi, ekebhi. Ekassa, ekesaṁ, ekesānaṁ. Ekasmā, ekamhā, ekehi, ekebhi. Ekassa, ekesaṁ, ekesānaṁ. Ekasmiṁ, ekamhi, ekesūti.
anya-e0803n12:176_4: eko ekā ekaṁ iccādi sabbattha sabbasaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:176_6: Evaṁ vadantā ca te vibhāgaṁ adassetvā vadanti.
anya-e0803n12:176_7: Mayaṁ pana sotūnaṁ payogesu kosalluppādanatthaṁ vibhāgaṁ dassetvā vadāma.
anya-e0803n12:177_0: Apicettha ayaṁ visesopi sallakkhitabbo ‘‘eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge’ti pāḷippadese paccattekavacanassa ekasaddassa ekārantaniddesopi dissatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n12:179_0: Ekā, ekā, ekāyo. Ekaṁ, ekā, ekāyo. Ekāya, ekāhi, ekābhi. Ekāya, ekissā, ekāsaṁ. Ekāya, ekāhi, ekābhi. Ekāya, ekissā, ekāsaṁ. Ekāya, ekāyaṁ, ekissaṁ, ekāsu.
anya-e0803n12:180_0: Apica ekasadde vicchāvasena vattabbe liṅgattayarūpāni ekavacanāneva bhavanti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n12:181_0: Ekeko, ekekaṁ, ekekena, ekekassa, ekekasmā, ekekamhā, ekekassa,
anya-e0803n12:182_2: napuṁsakaliṅgarūpāni. Ekekā, ekekaṁ, ekekāya, ekekissā, ekekāya, ekekissā, ekekāyaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:183_2: Iti imesu vicchāvasena vuttesu liṅgattayarūpesu samāsacintā na uppādetabbā anibbacanīyattā vicchāsaddānaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:183_3: Tathā hi ‘‘pabbaṁ pabbaṁ sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya taṭataṭāyantā saṅkhārā
anya-e0803n12:183_4: bhijjantī’’tiādīsu pabbapabbasaddādīnaṁ samāsakaraṇavasena nibbacanaṁ pubbācariyehi na dassitaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:183_5: Yasmā ca vicchāyaṁ vattamānānaṁ dvirutti lokato eva siddhā,
anya-e0803n12:184_0: Idāni ekacca ekatiya ekacciyasaddānaṁ nāmikapadamālāyo vuccante –
anya-e0803n12:184_1: pulliṅge tāva ekacco, ekacce. Ekaccaṁ, ekacce.
anya-e0803n12:192_0: Kaṭṭhaṁ niplavitaṁ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro.
anya-e0803n12:197_0: Ekākī, ekākī, ekākino. Ekākiṁ, ekākī, ekākino.
anya-e0803n12:197_1: Daṇḍīnayena ñeyyā. Ekākiyo, ekākiyā. Ekākiyaṁ, ekākiye.
anya-e0803n12:198_0: Ekāki kulaṁ, ekākī, ekākīni. Ekākiṁ, ekākī, ekākīni.
anya-e0803n12:199_8: Sabbāni panetāni asabbanāmikarūpāni atthantaraviññāpanatthaṁ vuttānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0803n12:200_0: Idāni dvisaddapariyāyassa sadā bahuvacanantassa sabbanāmikapadassa ubhasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:201_0: ‘‘Ubho , ubho, ubhohi, ubhobhi, ubhinnaṁ, ubhohi, ubhobhi, ubhinnaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:202_0: Idāni saṅkhāvacanānaṁ dviti catusaddānaṁ sadā bahuvacanantānaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ nāmikapadamālāyo vuccante –
anya-e0803n12:203_0: Dve, dve, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṁ, duvinnaṁ, dvīhi, dvībhi, dvinnaṁ, duvinnaṁ, dvīsu.
anya-e0803n12:203_2: Imāni ahaṁsaddādīni viya itthi liṅgādibhāvavinimuttānipi tīsu liṅgesu yujjante ‘‘dve purisā,
anya-e0803n12:204_0: ‘‘Dve’’ti rūpaṁ dvisaddassa, yaṁ samāsamhi taṁ bhave;
anya-e0803n12:209_6: Tāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane punappunaṁ upaparikkhitvā dissanti ce,
anya-e0803n12:210_4: Katthaci pana pāḷippadese tīṇisaddassa ṇikāralopopi bhavati ‘‘dve vāti vā udakaphusitānī’’ti.
anya-e0803n12:210_5: ‘‘Tiṇṇannaṁ kho bhikkhave indriyānaṁ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā piṇḍolabhāradvājena bhikkhunā aññā byākatā’’ti
anya-e0803n12:213_0: Yasmā tissa samāsamhi, saddhiṁ parapadena ve;
anya-e0803n12:217_0: Cattāro, caturo, cattāro, caturo, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṁ, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṁ, catūsu.
anya-e0803n12:218_4: Itthiliṅgaṭṭhāne ‘‘catunna’’nti padaṁ cūḷaniruttiyaṁ niruttipiṭake pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca dassanato vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:218_7: Pāḷiyaṁ pana soṇadantasuttādīsu ‘‘samaṇo gotamo catunnaṁ parisānaṁ piyo manāpo’’ti āgataṁ.
anya-e0803n12:218_8: Aṭṭhakathāsu ca pana suttantaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘catūhi acchariyabbhutadhammehi samannāgato catunnaṁ parisānaṁ piyo manāpo’’ti āgataṁ.
anya-e0803n12:218_9: Sattilaṅghajātakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘ācariyo panassa catunnaṁ sattīnaṁ laṅghanaṁ sippaṁ jānātī’’ti āgataṁ.
anya-e0803n12:219_0: Cattāri, cattāri, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṁ, catūhi, catūbhi, catubbhi, catunnaṁ, catūsu.
anya-e0803n12:226_0: Tvaṁ, tuvaṁ, tumhe. Taṁ, tuvaṁ, tvaṁ, tavaṁ, tumhe. Tayā, tvayā, tumhehi, tumhebhi. Tuyhaṁ, tava, tumhaṁ, tumhākaṁ. Tayā, tvayā, tumhehi, tumhebhi. Tuyhaṁ, tava, tumhaṁ, tumhākaṁ. Tayi, tvayi, tumhesu .
anya-e0803n12:228_0: Ahaṁ, ahakaṁ, mayaṁ, amhe. Maṁ, mamaṁ, amhe. Mayā, amhehi, amhebhi. Mayhaṁ, mama, amhaṁ, amhākaṁ, asmākaṁ. Mayā, amhehi, amhebhi. Mayhaṁ, mama, amhaṁ, amhākaṁ, asmākaṁ. Mayi, amhesu, asmesu.
anya-e0803n12:229_0: Ettha pana ‘‘kathaṁ amhe karomase’’ti pāḷidassanato ‘‘tumhe’’ti paccattavacanassa viya ‘‘amhe’’ti paccattavacanassapi atthitā veditabbā,
anya-e0803n12:229_2: Tassa atthibhāve ‘‘ahakañca cittavasānugā bhāsissa’’nti esā pāḷi nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:230_0: Kaccāyanacūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭakesu pana ‘‘tumhākaṁ amhāka’’nti ca dutiyābahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:230_4: cūḷaniruttiniruttipiṭake pana ‘‘tumhaṁ amha’’nti ca dutiyekavacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:230_6: Etāni upaparikkhitvā sāṭṭhakathesu suttantesu dissanti ce,
anya-e0803n12:231_0: Tumhaamhasaddānaṁ pana parapadehi saddhiṁ samāse ‘‘maṁdīpā’’tiādayo payogā tathāgatādimukhato sambhavanti.
anya-e0803n12:231_1: ‘‘Ete gāmaṇi maṁdīpā maṁleṇā maṁsaraṇā’’ti hi tathāgatamukhato,
anya-e0803n12:231_4: tulyaṁ nāññena kenacī’’ti ca ‘‘candena tvaṁmukhaṁ tulya’’nti ca kavimukhato.
anya-e0803n12:232_0: Tattha hi ahaṁ dīpo etesanti maṁdīpā,
anya-e0803n12:232_9: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘maṁdīpā’’iccādidassanato ‘‘tvaṁdīpā’’tiādīni kābyādāse ca ‘‘tvaṁmukha’’nti dassanato tvaṁvaṇṇo, tvaṁsaro,
anya-e0803n12:235_3: Yadi evaṁ kasmā padamālā visuṁ na vuttāti?
anya-e0803n12:236_0: ‘‘Te me vo no’’ti rūpāni, parāni padato yato;
anya-e0803n12:237_0: Tato nāmikapantīsu, na tu vuttāni tāni me.
anya-e0803n12:238_0: Ettha ca mayaṁ me vo nosaddānamatthuddhāro vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:238_10: Bāhirena paccayena vinā manasāva nibbattāti manomayā.
anya-e0803n12:238_13: ‘‘Pīṭhaṁ te sovaṇṇamayaṁ uḷāra’’nti ettha vikāratthe padapūraṇamatte vā daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_15: tadā suvaṇṇassa vikāro sovaṇṇamayanti vikāratthe mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:238_17: Yadā pana suvaṇṇena nibbattaṁ sovaṇṇanti ayamattho,
anya-e0803n12:238_18: tadā sovaṇṇameva sovaṇṇamayanti padapūraṇamatte mayasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n12:239_3: ‘‘Tassa me bhante bhagavā saṁkhittena dhammaṁ desetū’’tiādīsu sampadāne,
anya-e0803n12:239_5: ‘‘Pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato’’tiādīsu sāmiatthe,
anya-e0803n12:240_0: Karaṇe sampadāne ca, sāmiatthe ca āgato;
anya-e0803n12:242_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi kate te mesaddānamatthavivaraṇe vinicchayaṁ brūma tesamadhippāyappakāsanavasena sotūnaṁ saṁsayasamugghāṭanatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:242_1: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathācariyā temesaddānaṁ sampadānatthavasena ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇesuṁ,
anya-e0803n12:242_3: Evaṁ yvāyaṁ tehi asaṅkarato niyamo dassito,
anya-e0803n12:242_4: so sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane kuto labbhā.
anya-e0803n12:242_5: Tathā hi temesaddatthavācakā tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddā tava mamasaddā ca sampadānasāmiatthesu aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:243_23: Ubho mātāpitā mamāti evaṁ aniyamato pavattanti.
anya-e0803n12:244_0: Cūḷaniruttiyañhi yamakamahātherena catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ anaññarūpattaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṁ sabbattha anaññaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:244_3: Namo te buddha vīratthū’tiādīsu tuyhaṁsaddassa vasena sampadāne,
anya-e0803n12:244_6: tavāti hi attho’’tiādīni vadantā ‘‘ayuttaṁ saṁvaṇṇanaṁ saṁvaṇṇesu’’ntipi,
anya-e0803n12:244_10: Tathā hi te ‘‘saddasatthampi ekadesato sāsanānukūlaṁ hotī’’ti paresamanukampāya saddasatthato nayaṁ gahetvā
anya-e0803n12:244_11: sampadānatthavasena te mesaddānaṁ ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthaṁ saṁvaṇṇayiṁsu,
anya-e0803n12:244_15: Tasmā sāsane sāmaññena pavattāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni saddasatthe visesena pavattehi catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpehi
anya-e0803n12:244_16: samānagatikāni katvā paresamanukampāya sampadānatthe tuyhaṁ mayhaṁsaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo,
anya-e0803n12:244_17: sāmiatthe ca tava mamasaddānaṁ pavattiniyamo dassito.
anya-e0803n12:244_21: Tāya eva hi tehi evaṁ saṁvaṇṇanā katāti.
anya-e0803n12:245_1: nanu ca bho aṭṭhakathācariyehi saddanayaṁ nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sāmiatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tava mamā’’ti atthavacanena ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medena,
anya-e0803n12:245_2: na mayhaṁ bhariyā esā’’tiādīsu sāmivisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattuṁ,
anya-e0803n12:245_3: tathā saddanayaññeva nissāya te mesaddānaṁ sampadānatthe vattamānānaṁ ‘‘tuyhaṁ mayha’’nti atthavacanena ‘‘bhattaṁ tava na ruccati.
anya-e0803n12:245_4: Pabbajjā mama ruccatī’’tiādīsupi sampadānavisayesu vibhattivipallāsanayo dassitoti sakkā vattunti? Na sakkā,
anya-e0803n12:245_5: gāthāsu viya cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhānepi tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ aniyamena dvīsu atthesu pavattanato.
anya-e0803n12:245_6: Na hi īdise ṭhāne gāthāyaṁ vā cuṇṇiyapadaṭṭhāne vā vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:245_8: Kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmī’’tiādīsuyeva pana ṭhānesu icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:246_0: Yadi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsu vibhattivipallāso icchitabbo siyā,
anya-e0803n12:246_2: Brāhmaṇassa pitā adāsī’’tiādīsupi saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādinā vibhattivipallāsattho vacanīyo
anya-e0803n12:246_6: yasmā dānayoge vā namoyoge vā āyādesasahitāni catutthīchaṭṭhīrūpāni sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane nupalabbhanti,
anya-e0803n12:246_7: tasmā ‘‘brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādinā vibhattivipallāsatthavacane ayaṁ doso yadidaṁ avijjamānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:246_8: Yasmā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu vibhattivipallāsakaraṇaṁ sāvajjaṁ,
anya-e0803n12:246_9: tasmā ‘‘tuyhaṁ maṁsena medenā’’tiādīsupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabbo.
anya-e0803n12:247_3: Tathā hi pāvacane sa naṁsaddā sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattanti,
anya-e0803n12:247_5: ‘‘Aggassa dātā medhāvī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘aggassā’’ti ayaṁ saddo yadā kriyāpaṭiggahaṇaṁ paṭicca sampadānatthe pavattati,
anya-e0803n12:247_7: Yadā pana kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūte sāmiatthe pavattati,
anya-e0803n12:247_9: Evaṁ sabbathāpi vipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hotīti.
anya-e0803n12:247_10: Tathā saddanayaṁ nissāya ‘‘sampadānavacana’’nti tumhehi daḷhaṁ gahitassa mayhaṁsaddassa sāmiatthavasena
anya-e0803n12:247_11: paṇṇattiyaṁ dassanato vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoteva.
anya-e0803n12:250_2: idampi mayha’’nti kāyati ravatīti mayhakoti vuccati mayhasaddūpapadassa ke re ge saddeti dhātussa vasena.
anya-e0803n12:251_3: evaṁ sante lokavohārakusalena sabbaññunā tassa sakuṇassa ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇatti na vattabbā siyā anantogadhasampadānatthattā,
anya-e0803n12:251_4: antogadhasāmyatthattā pana ‘‘mamako’’ icceva paññatti vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0803n12:251_5: Etthapi ‘‘mayhako’’ti idaṁ vibhattivipallāsavasena vuttanti ce? Na,
anya-e0803n12:252_0: Apicettha mayhaṁsaddo sarūpato vibhatyantabhāvena tiṭṭhati kasaddena ekapadattūpagamanato,
anya-e0803n12:252_1: evaṁ santepi ‘‘mayhako’’ti ayaṁ sakuṇavisesavācako saddo paccattavacanabhāve ṭhitoyeva īsakaṁ sāmiatthampi jotayati sujampati rājapurisasaddā viya.
anya-e0803n12:252_2: Imināpi kāraṇena vibhattivipallāso tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0803n12:252_3: Iti ‘‘mayhako’’ti paṇṇattiyaṁ vattamānassa padāvayavabhūtassa mayhasaddassa avipallāsavacanalesena tuyhaṁ
anya-e0803n12:252_4: tava mamasaddesupi vibhattivipallāso na icchitabboti siddhaṁ.
anya-e0803n12:252_5: Tasmā aṭṭhakathācariyehi sampadānasāmiatthesu sāmaññena pavattānampi samānānaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁ tava mamasaddānaṁ
anya-e0803n12:252_6: saddanayaññeva nissāya paresamanukampāya vuttappakāro niyamo dassitoti avagantabbaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n12:255_0: Evaṁ santepi etesaṁ, niyamo natthi pāḷiyaṁ;
anya-e0803n12:256_0: Koci tesaṁ viseso ca, diṭṭho amhehi taṁ suṇa.
anya-e0803n12:258_0: ‘‘Tuyhaṁ mayha’’ntime saddā, te payogā na dullabhā.
anya-e0803n12:260_0: Sampadāne yahiṁ honti, te payogā panappakā.
anya-e0803n12:263_0: Sabbāpi imā nītiyo paramasukhumā sududdasā vīrajātinā sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbā.
anya-e0803n12:264_1: ‘‘Kacci vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā’’tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:268_1: Ayañhi ‘‘gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāmā’’ti ettha paccatte dissati.
anya-e0803n12:268_8: ‘‘Na no samaṁ atthi tathāgatenā’’ti ettha avadhāraṇe.
anya-e0803n12:268_13: ‘‘Na no sabhāyaṁ na karonti kiñcī’’tiādīsu nipātamatte.
anya-e0803n12:272_0: Idāni sabbanāmānaṁ yathārahaṁ saṁkhittena missakapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n12:273_0: Yo so, ye te. Yaṁ taṁ, ye te.
anya-e0803n12:273_2: Sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ. Yā sā, yā tā. Yaṁ taṁ, yā tā.
anya-e0803n12:274_0: ‘‘Eso so, ete te. Ayaṁ so, ime te.
anya-e0803n12:274_1: So ayaṁ te ime’’tiādinā yathāpayogaṁ padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n12:274_2: Tathā hi ‘‘yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako.
anya-e0803n12:274_3: Ete te bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā.
anya-e0803n12:274_4: Ayaṁ so sārathi etī’’ti evamādayo vicittappayogā dissanti.
anya-e0803n12:281_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
